title: Pogačar’s Focus on Worlds Isn’t About Records: ‘If We Raced for Statistics, Tadej Would Be at the Vuelta’
content:
UAE boss waves off historical milestones as Pogačar zeroes in on 'Triple Crown' marker: 'We don't race for that. We race to win.'

Read the full article at Pogačar’s Focus on Worlds Isn’t About Records: ‘If We Raced for Statistics, Tadej Would Be at the Vuelta’ on Velo.
author: ahood
